info.name: Hide Note content in Facebook comment (v1.1)
info.description: By Nguyễn Huệ Đăng from Dota2Vn
info.additionalInfo:
Notes is a powerful tool of Facebook which can access at: fb.com/notes
However, many malwares use Note as a method to post free Ads to Facebook Group. There might be mutual pictures that is NSFW. Therefore, I write this CSS to hide them. You still can view the note by visit the link on the comment.
